mapper.select:
select data_id, user_id, expert_id, patent_name, patent_code, patent_desc, patent_keys, patente_people_name, patente_people_id, invent_people_id, invent_people_name, apply_people, public_date, apply_date, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6, modify_user_disp, owner_tech_type, patente_background, owner_project_name, expert_nationality, owner_project_id, company, compan_id, sys_flag, data_order, del_flag, create_date, create_user, create_user_disp, modify_date, modify_user from zjk_patent where 1=1
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
and user_id like '%${userId}%'
and expert_id like '%${expertId}%'
and patent_name like '%${patentName}%'
and patent_code like '%${patentCode}%'
and patent_desc like '%${patentDesc}%'
and patent_keys like '%${patentKeys}%'
and patente_people_name like '%${patentePeopleName}%'
and patente_people_id like '%${patentePeopleId}%'
and invent_people_id like '%${inventPeopleId}%'
and invent_people_name like '%${inventPeopleName}%'
and apply_people like '%${applyPeople}%'
and public_date like '%${publicDate}%'
and apply_date like '%${applyDate}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
and modify_user_disp like '%${modifyUserDisp}%'
and owner_tech_type like '%${ownerTechType}%'
and patente_background like '%${patenteBackground}%'
and owner_project_name like '%${ownerProjectName}%'
and expert_nationality like '%${expertNationality}%'
and owner_project_id like '%${ownerProjectId}%'
and company like '%${company}%'
and compan_id like '%${companId}%'
and sys_flag like '%${sysFlag}%'
and data_order like '%${dataOrder}%'
and del_flag like '%${delFlag}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_disp like '%${createUserDisp}%'
and modify_date like '%${modifyDate}%'
and modify_user like '%${modifyUser}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
